experience.title: GM Procurement
experience.description: Looking after procurement of Capex , Projects, Revenue Spares and Revenue Consumables at Vijaynagar works. Negotiate and close about Rs. 1200 crores of goods and services per annum. Role included troubleshooting supplier's problems, payment issues,  quality and delivery issues etc. Role also included Vendor Development, Vendor Evaluation, Category Consolidation, Spend Analysis, Category Management, Process Improvement,  and driving TQM initiatives etc.
